title: In what ways do I get to know myself? According to Socrates plato Aristotle - Quora

response.answer_text: We can learn about how our animal and social drives behave within various circumstances, and then decide if we could or should attempt to influence those drives or circumstances. “Knowing what you do not know, and can not know, is also knowledge.”
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Chery Ann Garcia

response.answer_text: Examine your beliefs and values, your goals and moral principles in the light of great men and women and see what your strengths and weaknesses are.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Chery Ann Garcia
